1.0.name: wordpress/nextgen-facebook
1.0.description:
Open Graph meta property tags are read by almost all social websites, including Facebook, Google (Search and Google+), Twitter and LinkedIn. The Open Graph meta tags are embedded in the head section of webpages and describe the content for Facebook and other social websites. When someone shares one of your webpages, the title, description, images, videos, etc., will be presented properly to the social website.

NextGEN Facebook Open Graph (NGFB) adds Open Graph meta property tags to all webpage headers. This plugin goes well beyond any other plugins I know in handling various media and archive-type webpages. It will create appropriate title and description meta tags for category, tag, date based archive (day, month, or year), author webpages, and search results. NGFB also detects images from a variety of sources (featured, attached, preview, shortcodes, etc.), and embedded videos in th

NextGEN Facebook Open Graph (NGFB) adds Open Graph meta property tags to all webpage headers. This plugin goes well beyond any other plugins I know in handling various media and archive-type webpages. It will create appropriate title and description meta tags for category, tag, date based archive (day, month, or year), author webpages, and search results. NGFB also detects images from a variety of sources (featured, attached, preview, shortcodes, etc.), and embedded videos in th
